content: this is a pattern for a cute and easy pokémon-- espeon she s part of my expanding collection of chibi pokemon designs using the recommended yarn and hook she will be about 3 1/2 to 4 inches tall at the head and closer to 4 5 inches at the ear-tips she s consistent in size with my other pokémon amigurumi and other chibi eeveelutions you ll need a relatively small amount not more than 40g of light purple yarn scraps of black yarn or embroidery thread a 4mm crochet hook some stuffing plastic eyes 10mm is good dark blue felt something red for the forehead gem and a yarn needle espeon is pretty easy and pretty satisfying to craft in my opinion one cool feature is that she s all one color of yarn you may also have noticed that my light purple yarn isn t quite the right one for her i agree-- it was the closest i had available but not quite right other things to note are the fact that the red gem could be almost anything felt yarn plastic stone etc and that if you want to you can insert a pipe cleaner in the tail so that it s posable i hope you enjoy
